item.description:
Hi Packers Boston,

Its great to see so many new members joining, welcome to Keith, Jessica, Lucy, Max and Jimmy, as you know preseason is well underway and some of you have been asking if we have access to these games but we do not have them in this market, the only game that we have access to is the August 26th game against the Colts at 7.00pm, we will open and staff the 2nd floor for this game, I will also schedule up a meetup, please RSVP or email me at ray@bansheeboston.com or raybutler2000@earthlink.net if you are coming. In the past we have not got the biggest crowds for preseason so hopefully this will change this year. Raddeberger will be hosting the first regular game of the season New Orleans Saints @ Green Bay Packers, 7.30pm on August 8th.

Go Pack,

Boston Packers & Ray Butler.
﻿
item.how_to_find_us: 934 Dorchester Ave, Dorchester, Ma, 02125 we meet on the 2nd floor

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Packers v Colts Aug 26th
